function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation leading to increased S I value, potentially contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in poorly ventilated spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air circulation in indoor spaces","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, air quality sensors","People":"Office workers, occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building management, facility managers"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in transmission and infection nature of COVID-19, including potential for new, more transmissible variants","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing risk and implementing effective measures","Mitigation":"Continued research and data collection on virus transmission and variants","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, epidemiological surveillance tools","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty and variability in quanta generation rates impacting infection modeling and risk assessment","Impact":"Challenges in accurately evaluating the risk of airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Ongoing efforts to standardize and improve infection modeling parameters","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, computational fluid dynamics modeling","People":"Risk assessors, researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
